name: Hidden Veggie Mac & Cheese Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: elbow macaroni, water, cauliflower florets, butternut squash, carrot, milk, cheddar cheese, cream cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 pound elbow macaroni, cooked al dente
recipeInstructionSteps: Add water, cauliflower, squash, and carrots in a pot over medium heat. Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
Add everything into a blender, including cooking water, and blend until smooth.
Return blended veggies to the pot over medium heat, and add the milk, cheese, and cream cheese. Stir until smooth.
Add macaroni, reduce heat, mix thoroughly, and cover for 20 minutes.
